# crypto-market-data

> Live cryptocurrency and DeFi market data. Simple, easy, straight to the point.  Market data from CoinGecko •  Originally built within Lyra Web3 Playground https://github.com/nirholas/lyra-web3-playground - 

## Overview

crypto-market-data is an open-source project by nirholas. Live cryptocurrency and DeFi market data. Simple, easy, straight to the point.  Market data from CoinGecko •  Originally built within Lyra Web3 Playground https://github.com/nirholas/lyra-web3-playground - 

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/crypto-market-data
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
